Subject: Ted Sizemore healing process
Ted Sizemore is not recovering as fast as I have
hoped! So expect his injury to last about 14 more days.

Regards,
Team Doctor

Subject: Progress of Joe Lefebvre
Dear Sir,
Joe Lefebvre is hitting the ball well at A Fort Lauderdale Yankees!
He has an AVG of .317, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
